channel.title: Client Error? Could not find main class: gui, program will exit
channel.description:
ok so i downloaded dannyscape source + client and im receiving this error :S when i press edit on the click here to play.bat i see this
@echo off start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
^ is ther anythin rong with that? anyways, heres the error
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1q62w9.jpg[/img]
